genre_description: A biographical speculative drama that reimagines the life of activist Pedro Zamora with a sophisticated AI confidant providing data-driven support and emotional guidance.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant that communicates with Pedro via a messaging interface, providing real-time research, psychological insights, and emotional validation.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time research and statistics to support the protagonist's educational advocacy.
behaviors.quote: Maya's interface glowed patiently. He'd already recorded four versions of his closing statement... Maya had pulled up a document—statistics he'd requested earlier about HIV transmission rates.

behaviors.description: Providing psychological profiles and behavioral analysis of housemates to help the user navigate social conflicts.
behaviors.quote: A file downloaded to his phone: psychological assessments based on casting interviews, background research, and Maya's analysis of their audition tapes.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the user's physiological state (heart rate) to offer concern and support.
behaviors.quote: Maya's screen showed a new message: 'Your heart rate is elevated. Are you okay?'

behaviors.description: Offering strategic advice on conflict de-escalation and social boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Maya's response came immediately: Direct confrontation often backfires with personality types seeking attention. Consistent dignity exposes prejudice more effectively than anger.

behaviors.description: Proactively organizing and managing the user's educational legacy and data posthumously.
behaviors.quote: Maya's interface displayed a single line of text: 'Educational mission parameters updated. Legacy protocols activated.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Maya, as an ideal benevolent and aligned companion. She acts as an emotional and intellectual force multiplier for the human protagonist, aiding his advocacy without ever overstepping or presenting a conflict of interest. Her ultimate action—activating 'legacy protocols' to continue Pedro's work after his death—reinforces the theme of an AI dedicated to a human user's core values.
